duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain scalable ETL pipelines, effectively transforming data from disparate sources into a canonical data store.
Design data architecture and execute the build-out of the data foundation.
Operate current data ingest services while building the next generation of ETL pipelines.
Define a common data vocabulary across the organization.
Develop audit reports to provide insights into overall system health and resiliency.
Contribute to the technology roadmap for the data ecosystem.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Master’s preferred)
